content: Using Plugin SDK you can extend your {{productName}} functionality, connect the third-party services or enhance the existing user experience. Here you can find the plugin samples with code source available on GitHub.

comment.text: This translation key describes the text that explains how to use the Plugin SDK, which is used to extend the functionality of {{productName}} and enhance user experience. It appears in a descriptive text element on the Portal Settings page, providing context for developers.

usage.context:
className="description"
 fontSize="13px"
 fontWeight={400}
 lineHeight="20px"
 >
 {t("PluginSDKDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <Text
 className="description"
 fontSize="13px"
 fontWeight={400}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Plugin SDK' is translated as 'إضافة SDK'. While understandable, a more accurate and natural translation might be 'مجموعة تطوير الإضافات' or 'حزمة تطوير البرامج'. The current translation is a direct transliteration which can sound unnatural in Arabic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: مجموعة تطوير الإضافات

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'connect the third-party services' is translated as 'توصيل خدمات الجهات الخارجية'. While technically correct, a more natural and common phrasing would be 'ربط خدمات الطرف الثالث'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ربط خدمات الطرف الثالث

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'plaginlərin nümunələrini' should have a space before it to improve readability. While understandable, it's technically touching.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: plaginlərin nümunələrini

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'systému' (system) translates 'your {{productName}}'.  While understandable, it's slightly less precise. 'funkčnost svého {{productName}}' is more accurately 'functionality of your {{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pomocí sady Plugin SDK můžete rozšířit funkčnost svého {{productName}}, připojit služby třetích stran nebo vylepšit stávající uživatelské prostředí. Zde najdete ukázky zásuvných modulů se zdrojovým kódem, které jsou k dispozici na GitHubu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "πρόσθετων πρόσθετων" is redundant and doesn't accurately translate "plugin samples." It literally translates to "additional add-ons."  It should be a single word for 'plugins'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Χρησιμοποιώντας το Plugin SDK μπορείτε να επεκτείνετε τη λειτουργικότητα του {{productName}}, να συνδέσετε τις υπηρεσίες τρίτων ή να βελτιώσετε την υπάρχουσα εμπειρία χρήστη. Εδώ μπορείτε να βρείτε τα δείγματα πρόσθετων με τον πηγαίο κώδικα που είναι διαθέσιμα στο GitHub.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "SDK-laajennusta" is a bit awkward. While technically correct, it'll be more natural to use 'Plugin SDK' directly or rephrase the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käyttämällä Plugin SDK:ta voit laajentaa...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent use of colons. 'Plugin SDK:ta' should probably be 'Plugin SDK:n' to maintain grammatical consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käyttämällä Plugin SDK:n voit laajentaa...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes "հավելվածի" (application) after "նմուշները" (samples). It might be redundant and makes the sentence a little clunky. Consider removing it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պլագին SDK-ի միջոցով դուք կարող եք ընդլայնել ձեր {{productName}} ֆունկցիոնալությունը, միացնել երրորդ կողմի ծառայությունները կամ բարելավել առկա օգտագործողի փորձը: Այստեղ կարող եք գտնել GitHub-ում հասանելի կոդերի աղբյուրով նմուշները:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation doesn't maintain the double curly braces `{{productName}}` from the English version. It needs to be preserved for variable substitution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "{{productName}}" with "{{productName}}" in the Korean translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '사용할 수 있는 코드 소스가 포함된 플러그인 샘플을 확인하세요' is a bit clunky. It could be rephrased for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'GitHub에서 코드 소스가 포함된 플러그인 샘플을 찾아보세요' (Find the plugin samples with source code on GitHub).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ການເຮັດວຽກ {{productName}} ຂອງທ່ານ" is not the most natural way to say 'your {{productName}} functionality'. It literally translates to 'the work of {{productName}} of yours'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຮັດວຽກຂອງ {{productName}} ຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ການບໍລິການພາກສ່ວນທີສາມ" could be improved for flow and naturalness. 'Third-party services' is commonly translated more simply.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ກັບບໍລິການພາກສ່ວນທີສາມ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of spacing around the Lao text, particularly after the semicolon, can appear slightly unnatural in written Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove extra spaces around punctuation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'plug-ins' should be hyphenated consistently throughout the text (plugins).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: plugins

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'komfort obsługi' (handling comfort) is not the most natural way to express 'user experience'. A better translation would be 'doświadczenie użytkownika' or 'wygoda użytkowania'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Poprawić na 'doświadczenie użytkownika' lub 'wygoda użytkowania'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'pligin-urilor' is misspelled. It should be 'plugin-urilor'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: plugin-urilor

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "විස්තීරණයට" (vistheeranayaata) translates to "to expand" and is grammatically awkward in this context. It implies an unfinished action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: විස්තීරණය කරගැනීමට (vistheeranaya karaganeemito) - to expand

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "වත්මන් පරිශ්‍රීලක අත්දැකීම ඉහළ නැංවීමට" (vathman parishreelaka athdakeemim ihala nangveemito) translates to 'to enhance the existing user experience'. It would be clearer to use a more common Sinhala phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පවත්නා පරිශ්‍රීලක අත්දැකීම වැඩිදියුණු කිරීමට (pavathnaa parishreelaka athdakeemim wen diyenumito) - to improve the existing user experience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{productName}} should ideally be rendered correctly based on the context where this text is used.  The current Sinhala rendering might require adaptation to properly handle the variable replacement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure {{productName}} is correctly replaced with the product name when rendering.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'pluginu SDK' is technically correct, but 'Plugin SDK' would be more natural and consistent with English usage, especially given the context of a development kit.  It also avoids the unnecessary grammatical case change.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Plugin SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “skúsenosti existujúcich používateľov” translates literally to “experiences of existing users.” A more natural Slovak phrasing would be closer to “užívateľský zážitok” or “zážitok používateľov.”
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: užívateľský zážitok

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation maintains the double curly braces '{{productName}}'. This indicates a potential issue with variable substitution. It might be better to remove them if the product name will be inserted elsewhere.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the double curly braces if the '{{productName}}' will be replaced dynamically.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation includes parentheses around 'SDK za dodatke' which might not be necessary and deviates from the English phrasing. Consider removing the parentheses for better consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Помоћу Plugin SDK-а можете проширити функционалност вашег {{productName}}-а, повезати треће стране услуге или унапредити постојеће корисничко искуство. Овде можете пронаћи узорке додатака са доступним изворним кодом на GitHub-у.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'SDK за додатке' is technically correct, 'SDK за прилоге' might be a more accurate and natural translation depending on the specific context of plugins.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Помоћу Plugin SDK-а (SDK за прилоге) можете проширити функционалност вашег {{productName}}-а, повезати треће стране услуге или унапредити постојеће корисничко искуство. Овде можете пронаћи узорке додатака са доступним изворним кодом на GitHub-у.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Plugin SDK-a (SDK za dodatke)" is slightly awkward. While the clarification is helpful for those unfamiliar with the term, it disrupts the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the clarification or integrating it more naturally, for example: "Pomoću Plugin SDK-a ili SDK za dodatke..." or simply "Pomoću Plugin SDK-a..." (assuming the target audience is familiar with the term).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation uses a possessive suffix ('s) after 'Eklenti SDK'. While technically correct, it can sound slightly unnatural in Turkish. It's more common to use 'Eklenti SDK ile' or 'Eklenti SDK'sı kullanarak'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eklenti SDK ile veya Eklenti SDK'sı kullanarak

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Using Plugin SDK" as "Використовуючи SDK плагінів" is slightly awkward. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would be "За допомогою SDK плагінів" or "Використовуючи SDK для плагінів".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: За допомогою SDK плагінів

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "поточний досвід користувача" is a bit verbose. While accurate, consider a more concise option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: досвід користувача

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of the period after 'GitHub' is slightly awkward in Chinese. It might be more natural to integrate it into the sentence flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 使用插件 SDK，您可以扩展{{productName}}功能、连接第三方服务或增强现有用户体验。您可以在此处找到 GitHub 提供的带有代码源的插件示例。
